Counter-stike: Global Offensive é um jogo de muitas emoçoes... Voce passará raiva, ansiedade, tristeza em apenas em um unico round....
A comunidade é amigavel no começo, ate o global voce ja se tornou alguem toxico ou dropou pra GC...
Sem mais, nem menos .....

ну я играю 5 лет и вангую читеры это говно
A timeless classic with tons of updates. Strong aussie community

I think CS:GO is a great game if you are looking to improve FPS mechanics on PC and also just have fun in general. Sometimes I wish that the steam market worked a bit different in terms of selling skins because you can never keep the value of your inventory at a similar price from where it started. The skins system is very rigged for steam and valve to get money in comparison with other games such as Rocket League where odds are much higher and prices are lower. However all in all I still think the game is very fun and enjoyable.
Good game very skill based, toxic community but can be fun with friends
